function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of tangible resource allocation models for resilience planning","Impact":"Ineffective resource allocation leading to inadequate preparedness for contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Develop and implement resource allocation models for resilience planning","Technologies":"Data-driven modeling and analysis tools for resource allocation","People":"Communities, public health organizations, and government agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unexplored tradeoffs among the dimensions of resilience","Impact":"Suboptimal decision-making in resilience planning and response efforts","Mitigation":"Conduct research to identify and understand tradeoffs among resilience dimensions","Technologies":"Decision support systems and modeling tools for analyzing resilience tradeoffs","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of data-driven standards ensuring resilience","Impact":"Inconsistent and substandard resilience planning and preparedness measures","Mitigation":"Develop and implement data-driven standards for resilience assessment and planning","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, and sensor technologies for monitoring resilience indicators","People":"Regulatory bodies, government agencies, and research institutions","Owner":"Government agencies and research institutions"}]}
